resources.string:
- The objective of the game is to match 3 or more tokens of the same color to make them disappear.

 - Use your finger to swap 2 tokens. You can only swap horizontally and vertically and only 1 cell at a time.

 - 3 tokens are worth 100 points, 4 tokens are worth 200 points and 5 tokens are worth 300 points.

 - Moreover if after a successful combination, another one is made, it is a combo and the score is multiplied by the combo value for each new combination made during the combo.

 - You need to reach the objective score within the number of moves allowed to access to the next level.
All your progress will be lost. Do you wish to continue?
Your current progress will be lost. Do you wish to continue?
Do you wish to stop this game and go to the next level?
